content.content: Greetings from the Content Production Core Unit!  Administrative Updates  Our updated budget proposal will be posted in the coming days. Engaging with a lawyer to better understand our boundaries.   Content Production Video  Produced  [Maker Relay] The State of Dai (08/17 - 08/23) and (8/23 - 8/30)  [Maker Relay] Votes & Polls (08/17 - 08/23) and (8/23 - 8/30)    Uploaded  Governance and Risk (Ep 155) and (Ep 156)  Meet Your Delegate Ep 4  Forum at a Glance Ep 1 and Ep 2. Big thank you to @artemisios for putting these presentations together! Core Unit Launch Pod Session #15: StarkNet Engineering CU SNE-001    Writing  Produced Maker Relay Ep 59 and Ep 60 in collaboration with GovComms - also on Substack: Ep 59 and Ep 60  Published Dai on Different Networks #7 and #8  Published an Informal Poll to gauge community sentiment on the DAOs current brand messaging.  Audio  Produced  [Maker Relay] Votes & Polls (08/17 - 08/23) and (8/23 - 8/30)  New sound effects for transitions/other use!    Other  Hosted an AMA with PlanetX. Performed Content Audits on both the Community Portal and Makerdao.com. Collaborating with Strategic Happiness CU on new swag   Looking Ahead In the coming weeks, we’ll be:  Hosting an AMA with Centrifuge. Developing a working plan to update content and increase engagement on the DAO’s primary channels. Aggregating brand research data and beginning production on the Humans of MakerDAO series. Releasing a dashboard that tracks MakerDAO metrics, and beginning production on another to help consolidate Dai on Different Networks.  Appreciate all the feedback! We’ll be working to integrate a number of suggestions with these releases.   Continuing to interface with the GovComms and Growth CUs.  As always, check out our Transparency Dashboard 13 to see what we’re working on and please join us for our weekly Office Hours on Tuesdays at 14:30 UTC.
This topic was automatically closed 30 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
